name: Selkie (Game Jam)
description:
Take control of a Selkie, a mythical seal creature who can take human form. Seduce a local fisherman and steal his fish!

This short work was created in one weekend for Ludum Dare #35 Game Jam. The theme for the jam was "Shapeshift". It is very short, and the controls are admittedly not amazing, but game jams be game jams.

The music was provided by my talented brother, Chris Ver Voort. The album containing the tracks can be found here: https://chrisvervoort.bandcamp.com/album/sonorous-heart
